name: Sleep Dhikr
description: Peaceful remembrances before sleep for protection and blessings

dhikrs.title: Ayat al-Kursi Before Sleep
dhikrs.arabic: اللَّهُ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لاَ تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلاَ نَوْمٌ
dhikrs.transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa huwal-hayyul-qayyoom la ta'khudhuhu sinatun wa la nawm...
dhikrs.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep...
dhikrs.benefits: Protection throughout the night, an angel will guard you until morning

dhikrs.title: The Three Quls Before Sleep
dhikrs.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ * قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ * قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
dhikrs.transliteration: Qul huwa Allahu ahad, Qul a'udhu bi rabbil-falaq, Qul a'udhu bi rabbin-nas
dhikrs.translation: Say: He is Allah, the One! Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of the dawn. Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind.
dhikrs.benefits: Complete protection from all harm during sleep

dhikrs.title: Sleeping in Allah's Name
dhikrs.translation: In Your name O Allah, I die and I live.
dhikrs.benefits: Entrusting one's soul to Allah during sleep

dhikrs.title: Dua Before Sleep
dhikrs.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَسْلَمْتُ نَفْسِي إِلَيْكَ وَفَوَّضْتُ أَمْرِي إِلَيْكَ وَأَلْجَأْتُ ظَهْرِي إِلَيْكَ رَغْبَةً ورَهْبَةً إِلَيْكَ
dhikrs.transliteration: Allahumma aslamtu nafsi ilayka wa fawwadtu amri ilayka wa alja'tu zahri ilayka raghbatan wa rahbatan ilayk
dhikrs.translation: O Allah, I surrender myself to You, and entrust my affairs to You, and depend upon You for Your blessing both with hope and fear of You.
dhikrs.benefits: Complete trust and dependence on Allah
